# NSKeyValueChange.setting

**Case**

Indicates that the value of the observed key path was set to a new value. This change can occur when observing an attribute of an object, as well as properties that specify to-one and to-many relationships.

## Declaration

```swift
case setting
```

## Constants

- **NSKeyValueChange.insertion**: Indicates that an object has been inserted into the to-many relationship that is being observed.
- **NSKeyValueChange.removal**: Indicates that an object has been removed from the to-many relationship that is being observed.
- **NSKeyValueChange.replacement**: Indicates that an object has been replaced in the to-many relationship that is being observed.
